title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART HOW I GOT HERE
description: "Aren't you going to ask me how I got in here?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry... " he says almost gently...."
dialogueTree.text: "Harry... " he says almost gently. "Honestly, I'm just relieved you didn't get a hernia. A man your age..."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Evrart Claire: "The big man peers at you over the r..."
links.text: The big man peers at you over the rims of his glasses for a moment, then interlaces his fingers and rests his chin on his hands.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Anyway, I assure you, I am a very..."
links.text: "Anyway, I assure you, I am a very well-informed man. Information reaches me before I even get the chance to request it."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes, but it's because his word usua..."
links.text: Yes, but it's because his word usually sets things in motion.

links.title: You: ""Evrart, that's just giving orders.""
links.text: "Evrart, that's just giving orders."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, you're so clever, Harry. And t..."
links.text: "Oh, you're so clever, Harry. And technically you're right. Now... what else can I do for you?"

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about something else.""
links.text: "Let's talk about something else."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But of course, Harry.""
links.text: "But of course, Harry."

links.title: You: ""'A man my age'? What are you imply..."
links.text: "'A man my age'? What are you implying? I'm at the peak of my abilities."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, yes, Harry. You are obviously..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, Harry. You are obviously in peak physical condition and I salute both your initiative and your physical prowess. Very impressive, Harry. *Very impressive*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Hmmm..." He inspects you over the..."
links.text: "Hmmm..." He inspects you over the rims of his glasses. "You did look like you were gonna collapse and die when I told you about your lost gun."

links.title: You: ""I too am surprised by the resilien..."
links.text: "I too am surprised by the resilience and athleticism of this tool I've been provided with." (Tap your chest.)

links.title: You: ""My body's gonna break down any mom..."
links.text: "My body's gonna break down any moment now. Probably pushed it to the limit."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Rubbish, Harry, rubbish! I mean lo..."
links.text: "Rubbish, Harry, rubbish! I mean look at you!" He raises his hands towards you. "For your age you are obviously in peak physical condition. A real silverback!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Hmmm..." He inspects you over the..."
links.text: "Hmmm..." He inspects you over the rims of his glasses. "You did look like you were gonna collapse and die when I told you about your lost gun."

links.title: You: ""Enough wackiness. Let's get back t..."
links.text: "Enough wackiness. Let's get back to business."

links.title: Evrart Claire: "He chuckles. "Things *do* always tu..."
links.text: He chuckles. "Things *do* always turn real wacky when you and I are in the same room, don't they, Harry?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Am I going to ask? Hell, Harry --..."
dialogueTree.text: "Am I going to ask? Hell, Harry -- you *spin-kicked* my strongest man in the face. I saw it from my window!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Would *you* ask a man like that ho..."
links.text: "Would *you* ask a man like that how he got into *your* container yard?"

links.title: You: ""I understand. I am a terrifying de..."
links.text: "I understand. I am a terrifying death machine."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't worry, Harry." He leans in c..."
links.text: "Don't worry, Harry." He leans in closer. "Between you and me, I'm not a huge fan of his race thing, but the Union did not get where we are today by frowning on eccentricity."

links.title: You: ""I don't even know how I was able t..."
links.text: "I don't even know how I was able to do that."

links.title: You: ""You don't have a window.""
links.text: "You don't have a window."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It was a figure of speech, Harry...."
links.text: "It was a figure of speech, Harry. Of course I don't have a window. I'm in a container."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Honestly, I didn't want to bring i..."
dialogueTree.text: "Honestly, I didn't want to bring it up, Harry -- I heard you have become Measurehead's race pupil...?"

links.title: You: ""I really believe in the race myste..."
links.text: "I really believe in the race mystery and I'm glad I was given this chance. I hope to one day be able to contribute."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Personally I'm not big on the whol..."
links.text: "Personally I'm not big on the whole race thing, but that's okay. It's alright to be a massive racist, Harry." He sinks deeper into his armchair.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Let me assure you, I'm very glad y..."
links.text: "Let me assure you, I'm very glad you're comfortable sharing this with me. I run a big and quirky organisation. Everyone is welcome. Birds of all feathers."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a *race pupil*, I just lis..."
links.text: "I'm not a *race pupil*, I just listened to some of the things he had to say."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry, of course! You'r..."
links.text: "Of course, Harry, of course! You're not some kind of a fantastic racist now. And rest assured, no one's gonna hear about it." He winks at you.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No one's gonna know what you did w..."
links.text: "No one's gonna know what you did with race there, Harry. Your race-bonanza is safe with me. Word of how *racy* it got will never leave Martinaise."

links.title: Half Light: "You can see the map of Revachol in..."
links.text: You can see the map of Revachol in your head. Dozens of red arrows are pointing outwards from Martinaise. Moving all across the city.

links.title: You: ""It was a tactic, I needed to get i..."
links.text: "It was a tactic, I needed to get in somehow. It's not like I'm a racist now."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm a big racist. It's basic..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm a big racist. It's basically like that in my head all the time."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unfortunately, I can confirm this...."
links.text: "Unfortunately, I can confirm this. My partner has some decidedly outmoded views."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, I assure you, I am a very w..."
dialogueTree.text: "Harry, I assure you, I am a very well-informed man. Usually I have all the necessary information *before* I need to request it."
